document_data.name: Lady Zuggi
document_data.mainbody: '''Lady Zuggi'' was a noblewoman and scholar of Heraldry from the [[Blade Kingdoms]] who authored ''[[Lady Zuggi's Primer of Basic Heraldry, including appendices on Charges, Countercharges, and Trends of Modern Times]]'' sometime before [[1217 DR]].
document_data.History: By 1217 DR, ''Lady Zuggi's Primer'' was considered an essential volume for the young nobles of the Blade Kingdoms. The book was a required study even for the Princes and Princesses of the city-states. In 1217 DR, Princess [[Milianna Mannicci da Sumbria]] used an arcane spell to record herself reading the dreadful book to use it as a cover while she studied [[wizard]]ly magics.
